chunks.content: Throughout a career spanning 19 years, she has sold over 118 million records as a solo artist.

metadata.relevance_reason: This directly answers the question about the number of records Beyoncé released under her own name after leaving Destiny's Child.
metadata.answer_contribution: Beyoncé has released over 118 million records as a solo artist.

required_info: number of records released by Beyoncé after leaving Destiny's Child
